description: This header file declares the exported APIs of the Slap Sco Collection Object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) component. It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, initializing, and resetting the collection object, serving as an interface for external modules to interact with these functionalities.

methods.name: SlapCreateScoCollection
methods.description: Creates a new SLAP Sco Collection object with provided container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: SlapScoColCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Sco Collection with given context handles.

methods.name: SlapScoColEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects for the Sco Collection.

methods.name: SlapScoColReset
methods.description: Resets the state of the Sco Collection object.
